snippet: The decision was in part to maintain international credibility in addressing Syria’s civil war, the foreign minister said.
abstract: German experts will help destroy chemical weapons removed from Syria under auspices of United Nations and the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons.
lead_paragraph: The decision was in part to maintain international credibility in addressing Syria’s civil war, the foreign minister said.

headline.main: Germany to Help in Disposal of Syrian Chemical Weapons
headline.print_headline: Germany: More Help Offered in Effort To Destroy Syria’s Chemical Weapons
